summary: Successfully implemented the requested features in EnrichmentScreen: 1) Added custom column functionality similar to SearchScreen's 'Other' button, allowing users to add custom data columns to the table, 2) Styled the column selection checkboxes as pill buttons with improved visual design and hover effects.
current_status: The EnrichmentScreen now features pill-style column selection buttons and a custom column input system. Users can add custom columns that appear in the data table with proper state management and visual feedback. The interface is more intuitive and visually appealing.
